definition: Sonid Left banner in Xilin Gol league 錫林郭勒盟|锡林郭勒盟[Xi1 lin2 guo1 le4 meng2], Inner Mongolia
Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
banner/flag/(in Qing times) Manchu (cf. 八旗[Ba1 qi2])/administrative subdivision in inner Mongolia equivalent to 縣|县[xian4] county/CL:面[mian4]

sentences.english: The second chapter mainly deals with the structural characteristics of the Geographical Names in Sonid Left Banner.
sentences.chinese: 第二章，主要闡述了蘇尼特左旗地名的結構特徵。
